name: The Ancient
description:
Turn-based chess-like strategy game inspired by Hearthstone.

Main game features:

  • Local multiplayer and teamplay (1 vs1, 2 vs 2);
  • Singleplayer adventure campaign (demo);
  • AI (playing against computer);
  • Built-in map editor;
  • Atmospheric soundtrack;
  • Multilangual support.

Best played with friends (1 vs 1, 2 vs 2).

This game is re-make of The Ancient game made at Last Minute Jam.

"The Ancient" is available in English and Russian languages (switchable during the gameplay).

Game soundtrack is original and composed by the game creator.

Information for game creators: if you use VK, you can tell people about your game at World of Indie group.
